features.0: Advanced lithium-ion technology for optimal performance

measures.1: Keep in upright position at all times
measures.3: Do not add pure water (Pure water level should be 1.5 cm above plates)
measures.4: Always wear protective goggles suitable for working conditions during battery maintenance (adding water, cleaning, charging)
measures.5: Wear protective clothing if there is a risk of acid splashing

general.0: Always store upright in a dry and cool place (10°C - 25°C)
general.1: Place batteries on wooden pallets to avoid direct contact with concrete floor

chargeLevel.0: Pre-sale battery charge level should be above 12.6V
chargeLevel.1: Minimum voltage during storage should be 12.4V
chargeLevel.2: If voltage is low, open package and charge at 16.1V and 1/20Cn current to prevent permanent damage

installation.0: Verify battery compatibility from vehicle manual
installation.5: Install new battery (connect positive cable first)

procedures.0: In case of damage, immediately disconnect and isolate
procedures.1: Contact emergency services if leakage or fire occurs
procedures.2: Follow proper disposal procedures for damaged items
procedures.3: Document and report any safety incidents
procedures.4: In case of eye or skin contact, rinse with plenty of water
procedures.6: If swallowed: Drink plenty of water and milk. Consult a doctor
procedures.7: Spillage: Wash small spills with water
